ofx:section.ofx:paragraph:
100
Sometimes the information system puts forward suggestions on how to solve a problem. For example, it can suggest that one could spread payments across different budget lines or the types of indicators that could be used for monitoring.
Whenever this magic happens, you will see the \iconUiMagicS symbol. When the friendly wizard next to this paragraph appears, it indicates that such an option is available and he will tell you how to work with the \iconUiMagicS.
